name: A Game About Queueing
description: The objective of this game was to convey certain thoughts and emotions related to the ubiquitous problem of queuing in contemporary society. The Q, A, S, W, and D keys are mostly used to control the characters in this game. Q is employed to advance the character in both the first, the third and the sixth scenes. A, S, W, and D are used to move the character in the remaining scenes. You can advance the narration by using the 'blank' key.
